entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Gulf Islands (Southern)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Saturna Island 12:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Temperature: 2.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: S 40 km/h gust 50 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow or rain. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing to periods of rain mixed with wet snow near midnight and ending before morning then clearing. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming south 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low zero with temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 in the morning. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
